comment.body: I deleted mine, so I agree with you.
There are currently 25759 ZeroID registered, but there is no way to precisely know how many users have been running Zeronet.
@Voruman: There are two json files listing the registered users. They can be found in the `ZeroNet/data/1iD5ZQJMNXu43w1qLB8sfdHVKppVMduGz/data` diretory
